blocks.name: iblidicc
blocks.content: The identity function is integrable on any closed interval. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iblidicc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), cv(s0)), cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), cv(s0)), cibl), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), cv(s0)), co(co(c0, cicc, c1), ccncf, cc)))
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), cv(s0)), co(co(c0, cicc, c1), ccncf, cc)), wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cc), wss(cc, cc))
  syl6ss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cc, cr, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  iccssre(c0, c1)
  ax-resscn()
  ssid(cc)
  cncfmptid(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), cc)
  cniccibl(c0, c1, cmpt(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), cv(s0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cicc, c1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm iblidicc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)↦ s0)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, (s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)↦ s0)∈ L^1, c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, (s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)↦ s0)∈((c0[[,]]c1)[-cn->]ℂ))
  sylancl(w0, (s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)↦ s0)∈((c0[[,]]c1)[-cn->]ℂ), (c0[[,]]c1)⊆ ℂ, ℂ ⊆ ℂ)
  syl6ss((c0[[,]]c1), cc, cr, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[[,]]c1)⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  iccssre(c0, c1)
  ax-resscn()
  ssid(cc)
  cncfmptid(s0, (c0[[,]]c1), cc)
  cniccibl(c0, c1, (s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)↦ s0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cicc, c1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rpsqrtcn
blocks.content: Continuity of the real positive square root function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm rpsqrtcn() {
  |- wcel(cres(csqrt, crp), co(crp, ccncf, crp))
} = {
  mpbir(wcel(cres(csqrt, crp), co(crp, ccncf, crp)), wf(cres(csqrt, crp), crp, crp))
  mpbir(wf(cres(csqrt, crp), crp, crp), wral(hs0, crp, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(csqrt)), wcel(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), crp))))
  rgen(hs0, crp, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(csqrt)), wcel(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), crp)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(csqrt)), wcel(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), crp))
  sseli(cv(hs0), crp, cdm(csqrt))
  sseqtr4i(crp, cdm(csqrt), cc)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(csqrt), cc), wf(csqrt, cc, cc))
  fdm(csqrt, cc, cc)
  rpsqrtcl(cv(hs0))
  ax-mp(wb(wf(cres(csqrt, crp), crp, crp), wral(hs0, crp, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(csqrt)), wcel(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), crp)))), wfun(csqrt))
  ax-mp(wfun(csqrt), wf(csqrt, cc, cc))
  sqrtf()
  ffun(csqrt, cc, cc)
  ffvresb(hs0, csqrt, crp, crp)
  mp2an(wb(wcel(cres(csqrt, crp), co(crp, ccncf, crp)), wf(cres(csqrt, crp), crp, crp)), wss(crp, cc), wcel(cres(csqrt, crp), co(crp, ccncf, cr)))
  sstri(crp, cc, cr)
  rpssre()
  ax-resscn()
  eqeltrri(cres(csqrt, crp), co(crp, ccncf, cr), cres(cres(csqrt, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), crp))
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cres(csqrt, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), crp), cres(csqrt, crp)), wss(crp, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  resabs1(crp, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), csqrt)
  mp2(wcel(cres(cres(csqrt, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), crp), co(crp, ccncf, cr)), wss(crp, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(cres(csqrt, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), co(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), ccncf, cr)))
  eqsstr3i(crp, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), co(nat0, cioo, cpnf))
  ioorp()
  ioossico(nat0, cpnf)
  resqrtcn()
  rescncf(crp, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cres(csqrt, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), cr)
  cncffvrn(crp, cres(csqrt, crp), crp, cr)
  diff.hs0.c(csqrt)
  diff.hs0.c(crp)
}

thm rpsqrtcn() {
  ⊢ (sqrt |` ℝ+)∈(ℝ+[-cn->]ℝ+)
} = {
  mpbir((sqrt |` ℝ+)∈(ℝ+[-cn->]ℝ+), ((sqrt |` ℝ+): ℝ+ → ℝ+))
  mpbir(((sqrt |` ℝ+): ℝ+ → ℝ+), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+,(hs0 ∈ dom(sqrt)∧(sqrt ` hs0)∈ ℝ+)))

  sseli(hs0, crp, dom(sqrt))
  sseqtr4i(crp, dom(sqrt), cc)
  ax-mp(dom(sqrt)= ℂ, (sqrt : ℂ → ℂ))
  fdm(csqrt, cc, cc)
  rpsqrtcl(hs0)
  ax-mp((((sqrt |` ℝ+): ℝ+ → ℝ+)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+,(hs0 ∈ dom(sqrt)∧(sqrt ` hs0)∈ ℝ+))), Fun(sqrt))
  ax-mp(Fun(sqrt), (sqrt : ℂ → ℂ))
  sqrtf()
  ffun(csqrt, cc, cc)
  ffvresb(hs0, csqrt, crp, crp)
  mp2an(((sqrt |` ℝ+)∈(ℝ+[-cn->]ℝ+)↔((sqrt |` ℝ+): ℝ+ → ℝ+)), ℝ+ ⊆ ℂ, (sqrt |` ℝ+)∈(ℝ+[-cn->]ℝ))
  sstri(crp, cc, cr)
  rpssre()
  ax-resscn()
  eqeltrri((sqrt |` ℝ+), (ℝ+[-cn->]ℝ), ((sqrt |`(0[[,)]+∞))|` ℝ+))
  ax-mp(((sqrt |`(0[[,)]+∞))|` ℝ+)=(sqrt |` ℝ+), ℝ+ ⊆(0[[,)]+∞))
  resabs1(crp, (0[[,)]+∞), csqrt)
  mp2(((sqrt |`(0[[,)]+∞))|` ℝ+)∈(ℝ+[-cn->]ℝ), ℝ+ ⊆(0[[,)]+∞), (sqrt |`(0[[,)]+∞))∈((0[[,)]+∞)[-cn->]ℝ))
  eqsstr3i(crp, (0[[,)]+∞), (0[(,)]+∞))
  ioorp()
  ioossico(nat0, cpnf)
  resqrtcn()
  rescncf(crp, (0[[,)]+∞), (sqrt |`(0[[,)]+∞)), cr)
  cncffvrn(crp, (sqrt |` ℝ+), crp, cr)

  diff.hs0.c(crp)
}

blocks.name: divsqrtid
blocks.content: A real number divided by its square root. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm divsqrtid(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, c0)), cfv(csqrt, c0)))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(c0, cdiv, cfv(csqrt, c0)), cfv(csqrt, c0), co(co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cfv(csqrt, c0)), cdiv, cfv(csqrt, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cfv(csqrt, c0)), cdiv, cfv(csqrt, c0), c0, wcel(c0, crp))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cfv(csqrt, c0)), c0), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  rpge0(c0)
  remsqsqrt(c0)
  divcan4d(cfv(csqrt, c0), cfv(csqrt, c0), wcel(c0, crp))
  sqrtcld(c0, wcel(c0, crp))
  recnd(c0, wcel(c0, crp))
  rpre(c0)
  rpne0d(cfv(csqrt, c0), wcel(c0, crp))
  rpsqrtcl(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm divsqrtid(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℝ+ →(c0[÷](sqrt ` c0))=(sqrt ` c0))
} = {
  eqtr3d((c0[÷](sqrt ` c0)), (sqrt ` c0), (((sqrt ` c0)[×](sqrt ` c0))[÷](sqrt ` c0)), c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  oveq1d(((sqrt ` c0)[×](sqrt ` c0)), cdiv, (sqrt ` c0), c0, c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ ℝ+, ((sqrt ` c0)[×](sqrt ` c0))= c0, c0 ∈ ℝ, 0[≤]c0)
  rpge0(c0)
  remsqsqrt(c0)
  divcan4d((sqrt ` c0), (sqrt ` c0), c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  sqrtcld(c0, c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  recnd(c0, c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  rpre(c0)
  rpne0d((sqrt ` c0), c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  rpsqrtcl(c0)
}

blocks.name: actfunsnf1o
blocks.content: The action ` F ` of extending function from ` B ` to ` C ` with new values at point ` I ` is a bijection. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
